member.name: M:OWOGame.OWO.Configure(OWOGame.GameAuth)
member.summary: Assigns a GameAuth file that will be used to authenticate with the owo app.

member.name: M:OWOGame.OWO.AutoConnect
member.summary: Searches nearby owo apps to connect.

member.name: M:OWOGame.OWO.Connect(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for a specific owo app to connect.

member.name: M:OWOGame.OWO.Send(OWOGame.Sensation,OWOGame.Muscle[])
member.summary: Sends a sensation to the connected owo app.

member.name: M:OWOGame.OWO.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects from the connected owo app.
